parameters.text:
=Create an email content by considering the below (remove the additional content and give a gentle reminder if the task was completed; appreciate them if it was completed; if it was not completed, remind them to complete it):


Dear {{ $json['Team Member'] }}, 
Completed Tasks {{ $json['Completed Tasks'] }}, 
Blocked Tasks {{ $json['Blocked Tasks'] }},
Planned tasks {{ $json['Planned Tasks'] }},
Notes {{ $json.Notes }}

Thank you! Good day...

parameters.subject: Daily Summery Report
parameters.message:
Dear Sir/Madam,
Complete the task before the deadline

Team Member: Sowmiya
- Completed: Finished report draft, updated docs
- Blocked: Waiting for review
- Planned: Finalize report, send to client 

Team Member: dharshini
- Completed: Fixed bug #123, pushed to staging
- Blocked: API endpoint issues
- Planned: Test API fix, integrate feature 

Team Member: stephy
- Completed: Onboarded new team member
- Blocked: None
- Planned: Prepare training slides 

Team Member: karthi
- Completed: Reviewed PRs, updated deployment scripts
- Blocked: Awaiting deployment approval
- Planned: Deploy updates, monitor logs 

Thank you..!
